text.tspan: How much we think we spend on healthcare vs. how much we actually
Perception and actual health expenditure measured as a share of GDP.
How much we actually spend on health expenditure (% of GDP)
How much we think we spend on health expenditure (% of GDP)
Data source: Perceptions of spending on health expenditure - IPSOS (2016)
